name: Soda Bread Learns to Cat
description:
Meet Soda Bread--a small kitten with a big heart! 

Change can be scary, especially when everything is bigger than you and all your new friends know more than you. What's a kitten to do?

Help  Soda Bread navigate his new home, learn new skills, and use them!

- - - - - - -

This game is a Twine experiment and learning experience.  It will probably get updates as I learn the system!

Credits: cat image vector created by terdpongvector - www.freepik.com
Story written by Emily O'Neil
